segments.text: OK , so this is our newest machine . It was only installed last year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the running speed of the machine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About 1,500 metres per minute . It's one of the fastest in the world . We had a few problems with it after start-up but it's running very well now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If we're running at full capacity , it's 160,000 tonnes per annum .
segments.speaker: S1
